channel.title: NPC Shouting?
channel.description:
i usualy would be able to get npcs to shout, but on my source there is no npc's shouting already, e.g., i cant just hit ctrl+f and type moo to find it, please tell me what line i need to put the coding on, and also what code i need to put in, my deob is 317.
thank you in advance.

item.title: NPC Shouting?
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

Make them speak when you click them then?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Shouting?
item.dc:creator: @xalexo xalexo
item.description:
@xalexo wrote:

now i have 100 errors luckily i had a backup of npchandler.java, thanks for trying to help i guess, ill just live without shouting npcs.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Shouting?
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

Did you paste it as exactly ?

} if (npcs[i].npcType == #### && misc.random2(2) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "*******"; }

Make sure you take off an } .
Maybe yours look like

#code#code#code#code } } if (npcs[i].npcType == #### && misc.random2(2) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "*******"; }

So take off the } on top maybe ?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Shouting?
item.dc:creator: @xalexo xalexo
item.description:
@xalexo wrote:

thank you for your swift replies, but it gives me 29 errors when i compile, most of them being “illegal start of something”

do you know how to fix this?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Shouting?
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == #### && misc.random2(2) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "*******"; }

NpcHandler.java

Put it after any method when it closes. So find a method and place it after a }

Key

**** = Enter Text Here

= Npc ID

&& misc.random2(2)

Change the number 2 to how regualy the Npc Shouts.

E.g:

&& misc.random2(5)

Read full topic
